Game Summary:

You find yourself in a seemingly endless nightmare. You're being chased by your own image. No memories. The only thing you know is that you have to go through that door. The key? Lost in a maze. Obstacles? Unruly. Find yourself.

The player is trapped inside a maze filled with obstacles and enemies. The main goal of the player is to escape the maze through a door by using a key. To do this, the player must first look for a key which is located somewhere in the maze. However, there are enemies patrolling around the maze that will capture the player once they make contact and then take the key away. The player loses the key and will be respawned somewhere else in the maze, assuming he or she has already obtained the key, if an enemy captures him or her. There are obstacles scattered around the maze that may hinder the player from escaping from enemies. 

Controls:

WASD - Player movement
ALT - Enable/disable cursor 
SPACEBAR - Jump
R - Place markers
Mouse - Camera view
